fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Genius 194
fields.bodyText: * six clues swap their definitions with others in the group ** six clues lack a definition, but these are found in the six solutions above *** eight solutions need a single letter from one the first six above (RELATING) to be added to their clues **** eight solutions need a single letter, also from RELATING, to be removed from their clues Across 1* triangle try (hom) + ANGLE [9 across; figure] 5*** arrack A(ccepted)/RACK + R 9* integral INT(ernational) + LARGE (rev) [16 down; built in] 10*** blotto BOT/TO(o) + L 11**** once-over ONCE LOVER - L 12*** attrit TRAIT (anag) + T 13** * dissonance D  ANCE + N 18*** headlights HAD/LIGHTS + E 22**** Fugard FU  ND - N [Athol Fugard] 23** alarming MARGINAL (anag) [17 down; ALERTING] 24**** iridic I(gnoring)/R(egular)/I(ndications)/I(n)/D(iagnosis)/(I)s/C(oncerning) - I 25**** lion’s den DANIEL’S NO (anag) - A 26**** garage GEAR/AGE - E 27** reciting REC[(R(ing)/U(nion)]ITING [6 down; RELATING] Down 1** trigon T(herapy)/RIG/ON [1 across; TRIANGLE] 2** intact IN + TACT [2 down; INTEGRAL] 3**** nigh on NOTHING (anag) - T 4**** leavening IN GENERAL V(rey) (anag) - R 6* relating TALER (rev) + ING (Dutch bank) [7 down; linking] 7* altering TALE (anag) + RING [17 down; taking in] 8** knottier KNOT + TIER [16 down; TANGLIER] 14*** satellite STEL  E + A 15** shifting IF THINGS (anag) [7 down; ALTERING] 16* tanglier TANG  IER [1 across; more twisted] 17* alerting ALE + GRIN/T(ime) (anag) [6 down; WARNING] 19*** Brunei BRUNE (brown in French) + I 20**** bindhi BING + D(el)HI - G 21*** eggnog EGG ON + G
